pullRequest.title: Added Confirm Email Address field in registration form
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
LEARNER-7748

Added Confirm email address field below email field on the registration form
Update the registration URL API_Version based on config

nodes.bodyText: Please add this comment as TODO and add the reason why we need this check.
There should the TODO comment to remove this check, also add why we need this check.
As field type is EMAIL of the field CONFIRM_EMAIL so there is no use of these lines of code.

- Verify both email fields before call register account API
